2cc4f7a5-a5e6-4d39-bbd8-095498d08b4e:
Choose a {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}. You are particularly adept at that skill.
Benefit: You get a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} involving the chosen skill. If you have 10 or more ranks in that skill, this bonus increases to +6.
Special: You can gain this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new skill.
